title: Looking to trade this T202 Cobb for another T202 Cobb

posts.post_title: Looking to trade this T202 Cobb for another T202 Cobb
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade this T202 (Stovall/Cobb steals third base/Austin) plus $50 for either of the following:

Cobb/ Fast Work at third/O'leary
Cobb Good play at third/Moriarity
